content.title: **[{{ProdFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to adjust text watermarks in their applications by implementing a few easy steps:
content.step_1: Load your {{FileformatCap}} file to the main object of our API called {{TextWatermarkerBold}}. You can provide file for the further processing as stream or as a path on a local disk.
content.step_2: Next step is locating watermarks which must be adjusted. {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} helps as to identify watermarks with right properties which were previously added to a document.
content.step_3: Get list of suitable watermarks as a result of the {{TextSearchBold}} procedure. Adjust found watermarks properties such as size, page alignment, text, color, image content, etc. There are a lot of ways to customize your data.
content.step_4: After completion of watermarks adjustment process you need to save updated document. Use local file path, file or byte stream to store result.
